text: int x = 0 , y = 0 ; int sum ( int m , int n , int p [ n + 1 ] [ n + 1 ] , int o ) { int i ; if ( m == ( n + 1 ) ) { if ( x > y ) { y = x ; } ; return 0 ; } else { for ( i = 0 ; i <= 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( i == 0 ) { x = x + p [ m ] [ o ] ; sum ( m + 1 , n , p , o ) ; x = x - p [ m ] [ o ] ; } else { x = x + p [ m ] [ o + 1 ] ; sum ( m + 1 , n , p , o + 1 ) ; x = x - p [ m ] [ o + 1 ] ; o = o - 1 ; } } } return 0 ; } int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i , j , l = 0 , c = 0 , x = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n + 1 ] [ n + 1 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } sum ( 2 , n , a , 1 ) ; y = y + a [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , y ) ; } }
